__e: Ever since she moved out, and I gave the apartment to Marshall and Lily, I'd been crashing in university housing.
Is there any particular reason as to why you are barging into my girlfriend's dorm room at the crack of mid morning?
This isn't, you know, just a, a sweet, young guy, who's looking for some fun in his college dorm room.
She checked my name off a list, told me which dorm was mine, And said she'd keep an eye on my stuff while I went and found my room.
So I'm gonna go in the bunkhouse, and then you give me a minute, then you come out and tell the guys about her, and then I'll come along and make like I never seen her.

I'm just trying to have a beer and play a game and relax a little before I go home to my mother, who is staying with me in my one-room apartment, and listen to her question every single one of my life choices.
You have to take her to her friend's dorm.
I got a message from dorm security that I had a whole bunch of flowers, and I got all excited, like, "Oh, who are these from?"
Something's hit the dorm really bad and she's trying to get out.
